H0.text: Yarg and gevrik are cheeses from which county. Cornwall

H1.text: Yarg and gevrik are cheeses from which county. Devon

H2.text: Yarg and gevrik are cheeses from which county. Somerset

H3.text: Yarg and gevrik are cheeses from which county. Curnow

A4.text: Curnow is an anglicised spelling of Kernow, the Cornish word for Cornwall
